src:
Spokeswoman: Flamboyant Puerto Rican astrologer, TV personality Walter

03 Nov 2019


SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico (AP) - Spokeswoman: Flamboyant Puerto Rican astrologer, TV personality Walter Mercado dies at 88 from kidney failure.
